page_meta.title: About Rupi Dhillon | The Trauma Liberator

hero_section.headline: I am the woman who chose her own light.
hero_section.sub_headline: Trauma Liberator. Heart-Led Facilitator. Soulful Guide.
hero_section.description: I chose healing so my daughters could inherit freedom rather than carry wounds. I found my way back home to my true self.
hero_section.image_alt: Rupi Dhillon portrait, radiating calm strength

narrative_arc.title: The Roots
narrative_arc.content: My story begins in India, raised in a loving Joint Punjabi family rooted in spirituality, connection, and emotional safety. At nineteen, I moved to the UK through an arranged marriage, believing I was stepping into freedom.

narrative_arc.title: The Silence
narrative_arc.content: Instead, I entered years of control, silence, and abuse: physical, emotional, and psychological. Across two marriages and twenty-five years, I learned how deeply women can disappear while trying to keep the peace. I lived inside a silence shaped by cultural conditioning and the belief that endurance was strength.

narrative_arc.title: The Awakening
narrative_arc.content: In 2023, at fifty-one, I shattered the pattern. I chose myself. With the support of a mentor who offered emotional safety, I walked away from survival and came home to my truth. My pain became my strength. My silence became my mission.

philosophy_section.headline: This work is not about fixing you.
philosophy_section.intro_text: You are not broken. You are carrying what was never yours to hold — inherited beliefs, emotional imprints, and survival patterns that once kept you safe. I know this because I lived it. For decades, I moved through life in silence, strength, and self‑suppression — doing everything I was taught to do, yet feeling disconnected from my voice and worth.
key_points: You are carrying what was never yours to hold.
Insight alone doesn't create freedom; embodiment does.
philosophy_section.closing_statement: True transformation happens when the body feels safe enough to release what the mind has been carrying for years. That is the work I do.

credentials.intro: My work combines lived experience with deep clinical study. I don't collect tools—I understand why insight alone doesn't create freedom.

offerings.title: Soul Liberation Journey
offerings.subtitle: Begin Choosing Yourself
offerings.description: A six-week initiation for women ready to return to their voice, boundaries, and inner truth. This journey is for those who have learned to stay quiet, agreeable, or invisible — and are now ready to live with self-respect and emotional safety. Guided with care, precision, and deep attunement, you'll begin releasing self-abandonment and reconnecting with your inner authority.

offerings.title: Aattam
offerings.subtitle: Come Home to Self
offerings.description: An embodied journey into liberation, identity, and self-leadership. Aattam is for women who know surface-level healing is no longer enough. This is a space for deep integration — where healing moves beyond insight and becomes lived, grounded, and embodied. Through long-term support and intentional guidance, you step into clarity, sovereignty, and self-trust.
highlights: A return to who you are

call_to_action.text: If you're here, something in you already knows.
call_to_action.closing: And when you're ready, I'm here to walk with you — honestly, safely, and with purpose.
